section.name: Accounting of purchase returns.
section.p: On 16 Jan Bob found what 12 eggs and 1 pound of cheese is not fresh. At first he switched off method "PurchaseReturn, Credit SalesTaxFromPurchReturns per Tax." in the accounting settings. Then he has made purchase return to Carlo's grocery:
Field Site from is optional. If it's empty then withdrawal will be from the first warehouse site/s with available item/s.
